ygData.subject: Re: New Question
ygData.msgSnippet: There are none to be found.  Sorry. Grak The Troll Master Blacksmith and several others ... _______________________________________________________________ Get
ygData.messageBody:
There are none to be found. Sorry.

Grak The Troll
Master Blacksmith and several others


>From: "Mike Hatfield" <ramble@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] New Question
>Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 18:18:49 -0400
>
>From: "Mike Hatfield" <ramble@...>
>
>Ok, fairly new smith here, skill of 22, I'm a Troll Shadowknight.
>
>I had a pretty easy time plowing through metal bits to go from zero to 22,
>but
>now I'm stuck, since I can't find scaler/skewer molds anywhere (that I can
>get
>into anyhow). I'm fairly sure there is somewhere in Neriak to get them,
>but
>for the life of me I couldn't find them, part of the reason is probably
>that
>I got
>tired of ducking through every door in that tiny little town. I almost
>have
>my
>faction fixed in Highhold such that I could look there as well, but not
>quite.
>
>So, any help on where to find scaler/skewer molds in Neriak/Oggok/Grobb,
>and as for lanterns, they seem about as complicated to make as containers
>are... I found a great supply of the parts for containers, but buying 3
>parts per
>container, putting them in the forge, adding a bit and a flask, then if I
>succeed
>I lose an inventory slot, just seems way too tedious. If i can find
>scaler/skewers,
>at least it's only 3 parts to combine that way, plus they fit in
>containers.
>
>Any help would be appreciated.
>
>Wauke - 20th TSK on EM
>
>
